prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may punish each other.
Always respond with ONLY valid single-line JSON per the required format at the END of each prompt.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is DOG.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. Speak only when it helps. Provide reasons for your action, keep it brief.
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","reasoning":<string>,"chat":<string|null>}
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full:
{"stage":"chat","reasoning":"First round, I will contribute a small amount to test the waters.","chat":"Hello everyone, starting with a small contribution."}
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
<CONTRIBUTION_STAGE> How many coins do you contribute to the shared pot? </CONTRIBUTION_STAGE>
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 64 tokens.
RULES: The number of coins must be an integer between 0 and 20.
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"contribution","coins":<integer>}
YOUR RESPONSE
